page.title: 08VILLAGE DEVELOPMENT
page.content: The District Council is considering whether to allow the building of more houses in the village. Parents were asked their opinions. 61% thought that they did not want the village to grow bigger. The sorts of reasons they gave were- The school is too small now so no space for amenities- Danger small village becoming over populated,school especially-Loss of village identity -Sewerage system too small-Lack of public transport-Lack of employment- Loss of valuable farmland. 38% would like the village to grow bigger.The reasons they gave are-More money to be spent in shops-Hope for smaller houses for young people-Benefit to local economy-More people means more children, may force the building of a new school-Would help local shops to flourish, cutting cost of living.
